645620.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hell on Earth (Portrait Pack)
645620.description:
Hell on Earth Portrait Pack

Portraits for Fantasy Grounds II
UsageAfter installing this portrait pack, you will see a new Portrait Bag in your portrait window or the portraits displayed in the root portrait window, depending on the ruleset. For rulesets supporting portrait folders, it will be labeled HoE_Portraits. Double-click this bag to access the portraits. This product should work with any ruleset upgraded to version 3.0 or greater compatibility. For use in custom rulesets which have not yet been converted, please open the HoE_Portraits.ppk file in an archive program such as WinZip, WinRar or 7Zip and extract them to the root of your Fantasy Grounds portraits folder. You can access this folder from your Start | All Programs | Fantasy Grounds | Application Data folder shortcut.
These 105 portraits were generated from the Hell on Earth Figures Pack and then cropped and resized for use as portraits.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software. This product should work with all rulesets.
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
